Traits.Name: Life Link
Traits.Description: All foes with this trait on the battlefield share the same health pool.

Actions.Name: Immortalize
Actions.Description: A relict in range 3 gains Life Link.

Actions.Name: Link Vitality
Actions.Description: The priest links a relict and a foe they can see, marking both. While in range 4 of each other, each takes [D] Divine damage the first time in a turn the other linked character takes damage. A character may save to end this effect at the end of their turns. The mark ends on both of them if it ends on one.
